about_the_game:
"In the veil of infinity, there is still much to be discovered. Thousands are the wonders that dance among the stardust waiting to be found. There is still so much to learn from the lost leaves of time... So get out there Bean, set out to discover them all. I assure you, you won't be prepared for such a fun mystery."

Bean is a space archaeologist who travels the universe in search of the secrets of the universe's past. On one of his journeys he stumbles upon Tapioca V, a planet full of fascinating and diverse creatures called Puddies.



Become Bean and discover and befriend a host of different Puddies. How?

  • Call them out and if they are interested, they will approach you and join your herd.

  • Pet them and if they like it, they will approach you and join your herd.

  • Throw them food and if they eat it, they will approach you and join your herd.

  • Throw them, and if they like it, they will come and follow you.


But you will find obstacles to avoid, puzzles to solve by catching and throwing things.


  • Cute creatures, lots of them! Puddies is centered around the creatures that give name to the game. Our crowd system can generate huge amounts of monsters on screen, so don’t be overwhelmed!
  • Pick and throw mechanics inspired by classic 3D adventures. Bean has a lot of passion, perhaps a bit too much! You’ll have to solve all your problems by picking and throwing stuff around.
  • Herding and crowd control. In your adventures you’ll find yourself surrounded by Puddies. These cute little rascals can be quite mischievous, so you’ll have to manage the crowd while trying to avoid hazards that hamper your progress.
  • Light-hearted puzzles and exploration. Find your way around this strange planet and try to solve the mysteries hidden in this fascinating location.
  • Cell-shaded stylized graphics full of alien environments and strange structures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Are you curious to discover what lies beyond our planet? Accompany Bean on his space mission and discover an endless number of adorable creatures called Puddies that will have to be trained. Launch yourself into the unknown or you launch him.
